website_summaries.verdict: Despite occasional malfunctioning models, this is a good-looking, mid-priced appliance that is a close contender for the best by the brand.
pros: Chops and blends with precision, thanks to its 900 watts of power and 7 speeds with dual-direction reversible blade technology
The sleek brushed nickel finish compliments other small and large kitchen appliances
cons: Very rare reports of faulty models with customer service being prompt to help resolve such issues
Some of the plastic components feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: We use this product on a regular basis and we love it. Haven’t tried the shakes yet but I shall soon. Hasn’t stopped working or anything like that. We’ve had it for only two month so if it goes off I’ll come back and let y’all know
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, wouldn't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: This looked like it would be a perfect blender; but it wouldn't even turn on, and I had to return it. coming from a well-known company like Oster, I am very disappointed with the poor quality of blender they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby & Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Blender does not turn on
customer_reviews.text: They sold me a broken blender it does not work , so i was so exited unpacked my blender and it did not turn on very dissapointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie every morning. I have a nutribullet which works well but I have arthritis so the jar became very difficult to open. This makes the best smoothies. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: A great blender for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Costco, used for several weeks for daily smoothies. The smoothie setting starts out reversing blade direction repeatedly to avoid a big air bubble stopping the blending, a problem with every previous blender I used. After reversing 5 times, it blends in one direction with power and vigor. Handles thick mixes which included semi thawed fruit. Disassembles and cleans easy. I don't understand the review that complains about the plastic ring. Every blender I've owned has an almost identical base assembly which is usually trouble free if assembled properly. A bonus is that the blender is super powerful and very quiet. I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wings42

customer_reviews.title: I use it for a couple times and get pretty smooth, no problem
customer_reviews.text: I paid $30 in costco (after $10 rebate) for this Oster Pro 500 Blender few days ago. I use it for a couple times and get pretty smooth, no problem. I love it. it worth the money you paid.
customer_reviews.author: EWCEC

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This blender is workin great for me. I use it to make smoothies and use the frozen drink one-touch button. It's super fast and adds lots of air, tripling the volume of the finished product. I follow the directions to rinse it right after and then it for a bit with some water and drop of dishwashing liquid. Then I rinse it out and take it apart, including the ring, and let it air dry. Not giving it 5 stars because I haven't tried very dense ingredients yet, other than the ice
customer_reviews.author: suziq24

customer_reviews.title: Good value if it cost $1
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic ring that holds the blade assembly onto the glass broke in less than 1 month of use rendering the blender unusable. Blender rocks on the motor base. Poorly designed and cheaply made! You will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matsfanster

customer_reviews.title: Can I give this piece of garbage less than one star
customer_reviews.text: Can I give this piece of garbage less than one star? Just opened the box and it doesn't work. Motor strains, blades won't turn, and it's smoking like it's going to catch on fire. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: It is a piece of junk. It only lasted a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great Powerful Blender for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: As with other reviewers, I bought this at Costco for about $32. I have been using it a few months, and increased use making smoothies now that the weather is warmer. This isn't the industrial build of the far more expensive models, and may not last your 20 years. But for the price I paid, it is a very strong and versatile blender with a nice assortment of options. The base looks great. But when you touch it you can feel it is just chromed plastic. And a tad flimsy at that. But this is cosmetic, as you don't blend with the outer shell.
customer_reviews.author: In NYC

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Has a stable base and blends perfectly. Easily handles frozen fruit. I bought it at Costco on sale for $30. The buttons are sealed, so food won't get in. I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: G. Green

product_meta.title: Oster BLSTTA-C00-026 Blender, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description: The Oster Pro 500 Blender lets you take ice from cubed to crushed in seconds. It’s perfect for smoothies, dips, soups, sauces, and more. It features 900 power watts at startup for a burst of power. This smart blender has 7 speeds including preprogrammed settings for your favorite blended creations. The 6-cup Boroclass glass jar is dishwasher safe and can withstand thermal shock, and the lid includes a 2 oz. measuring cup. And dual direction blade technology spins the Crush Pro 6 Blade in forward and reverse motion, drawing ingredients down and optimizing the power to blend all types of foods.
feature_bullets: Smart blender features 7 speeds, including preprogrammed settings for the most common blender creations; makes a great smoothie blender
Features a 6-point, stainless steel, reversible blade that allows food to move down into the jar for thorough blending
6-cup dishwasher-safe Boroclass glass jar withstands thermal shock; 2 oz. filler cap lets you measure out ingredients
10-year All-Metal Drive limited warranty; 3-year satisfaction guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
